mean_cn: n. 请愿；请愿书；祈求；  v. 请愿
mean_en: a written document that many people sign to show that they want a person or organization to do or change something
word_etyma: pet追寻，寻求+ition表名词，行为过程→追寻状态→请愿
sentence: He asked me to sign the petition to legalize marijuana.
sentence_trans: 他让我在申请大麻合法的申请书上签字批准。
